author: jih2nn
content: tried the same config multiple times and it's flaky. haven't found the cause yet but I started to suspect there might be some subtle bug in fcuV4. will take a look into this more

author: nflaig
content:
As suspected it was not related to focil but rather how we pick sync aggregate for blocks, it just showed up now because of missed slots at the fork boundary, put more details here https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/8494, will have that merged and then update our focil branch.

I am still seeing the timeouts related to EL, those might cause some turbulence, I had some runs were the nodes downscored each other and disconnected which also stalls the run since there are only 2 nodes.

author: nflaig
content:
